Package com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics

Class BufferAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics.BufferAttribute
  • public class BufferAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing one attribute of a buffer layout, such as position, color or texture coordinates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferAttribute

        public BufferAttribute​(java.lang.String name,
                       int size,
                       int type,
                       boolean normalized)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the attribute as present in the shader
        size - is the number of components of the attribute
        type - is the GL type
        normalized - is true if the value is between 0 and 1
